name: figma-plugin-clerk-oauth
description: Figma plugin avec authentification OAuth via Clerk

scripts.postbuild: npm run create-ui-dir && npm run copy-html-files && npm run copy-manifest
scripts.create-ui-dir: if not exist dist\ui mkdir dist\ui
scripts.copy-html-files: copy src\ui\ProjectsPage.html dist\ui\ && copy src\ui\ImportPage.html dist\ui\
scripts.test:clerk: echo "Testing Clerk Connection" && webpack --mode=development && echo "Test build completed. Please run the plugin in Figma to see test results."
